primary_papers.title: Two Dogmas of Empiricism
primary_papers.key_role: Provides foundational critique of traditional conceptual analysis that we must address

supporting_papers.title: Conceptual Analysis and Reductive Explanation
supporting_papers.key_role: Demonstrates sophisticated hybrid approach to conceptual analysis combining descriptive and revisionary elements

key_concepts.role: Critical background concept for understanding limitations of traditional conceptual analysis
development_needs: Address how our framework operates without strong analytic/synthetic distinction
Show how different types avoid circularity concerns

key_concepts.role: Example of how theoretical commitments shape analytical methodology
development_needs: Show application to different types of analysis

engagement_priorities.rationale: Must show how our framework addresses fundamental challenges to conceptual analysis
Provides model for understanding interaction between descriptive and revisionary analysis
